title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
**Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - Your Solution to Insect Infestation**

Are you tired of dealing with pesky flies and other insects in your home or workspace? Look no further! Our Giant Fly Glue Trap is here to help. With its pre-baited, ready-to-use design, this trap is easy to set up and effective at catching those unwanted visitors.

**Effective Against a Wide Range of Insects**

Our giant fly glue trap is designed to catch flies, mosquitoes, moths, and other insects that can be found in residential, commercial, industrial, barn, waste room, or animal farm settings. Its scented green color and sticky adhesive surface work together to attract and trap even the most elusive pests.

**Non-Toxic and Safe for Use Indoors and Outdoors**

Unlike traditional traps, our Giant Fly Glue Trap is non-toxic and safe for use in areas where children, pets, or wildlife may be present. Its disposable design makes it easy to replace when needed, ensuring continued effectiveness without the risk of re-infestation.

**Long-Lasting and Easy to Use**

This trap can last up to one full year, making it a cost-effective solution for long-term insect control. Simply place the trap in areas where insects are most active, and let its adhesive surface do the rest. Its compact size (10 inches wide) makes it easy to fit into tight spaces, while its 30-foot length allows you to cover more ground.

**Intelligent Pest Management**

Our Giant Fly Glue Trap is part of our Intelligent Pest Management approach, which focuses on understanding the behavior and habits of pests to develop effective solutions. By using this trap in conjunction with other Catchmaster products, you can create a comprehensive pest management plan that works for your specific needs.

**Order Now and Take Back Your Space**

Don't let insects take over your home or workspace. Order our Giant Fly Glue Trap today and start enjoying a pest-free environment. With its easy-to-use design, non-toxic formula, and long-lasting adhesive surface, this trap is the perfect solution for anyone looking to eliminate insect infestations for good.

**Order Now and Get**

* 3 pre-baited glue traps, each measuring 30 feet in length
* A scented green color that attracts insects
* A non-toxic, disposable design that's safe for use indoors and outdoors
* A long-lasting adhesive surface that can last up to one full year
* Easy-to-use design that makes setup a breeze

Don't wait any longer. Order our Giant Fly Glue Trap today and start enjoying a pest-free environment tomorrow!

**Indoor and Outdoor Use**

Perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural settings, our trap is designed for use both indoors and outdoors. Its non-toxic adhesive ensures a safe and humane way to capture pests without harming the environment or other animals.

**Long-Lasting and Easy to Use**

Each pack covers 30 feet of surface area, providing ample coverage for your pest control needs. The disposable design makes it simple to replace traps as needed, and the pre-baited formula ensures consistent results. With its intelligent pest management approach, our trap is an effective solution for areas with high infestation levels.

**Key Features:**

* Scents attractant formula draws in pests
* Non-toxic adhesive ensures humane capture

* Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
* Perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural settings

**Don't let pest infestations get the best of you. Order our Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and take control of your insect problem!**
